Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class CliStatesController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CliStatesController
public class CliStatesController
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides overloading methods to update status of the CLI after receiving a certain message, in the sense that this changes what a player graphically see in his command line interface and the interaction allowed at runtime.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    CliStatesController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void updateCliState​(ErrorMessage message, UI ui)
    Method that change CLI state of player that has triggered an error.
    static void updateCliState​(GameResumedMessage message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state after a GameResumedMessage depending on game mode of the match that player joined again.
    static void updateCliState​(GameSetupMessage message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to NumOfPlayersChoiceCLI after a ServerAskForNumOfPlayer message is received.
    static void updateCliState​(ServerAskForGameMode message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to GameModeChoiceCLI after a ServerAskForGameMode message is received.
    static void updateCliState​(ServerAskForNumOfPlayer message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to NumOfPlayersChoiceCLI after a ServerAskForNumOfPlayer message is received.
    static void updateCliState​(ServerAsksForNickname message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to UsernameChoiceCLI after a ServerAsksForNickname message is received.
    static void updateCliState​(InitialLeaderChoiceUpdate message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to one between ActionChoiceCLI, WaitForTurnCLI or WaitForTurnCLI depending on selected game mode and his position after a InitialLeaderChoiceUpdate message is received.
    static void updateCliState​(LorenzoPlayedUpdate message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to ActionChoiceCLI after a LorenzoPlayedUpdate is received.
    static void updateCliState​(NewTurnUpdate message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to ActionChoiceCLI for player in turn after a NewTurnUpdate is received.
    static void updateCliState​(ServerAsksForPositioning message, UI ui)
    Changes CLI state to PositioningResourcesCLI after a ServerAsksForPositioning message is received.
    static void updateCliState​(UpdateMessage message, UI ui)
    Method called when an generic update is received.

    • updateCliState

      public static void updateCliState​(ErrorMessage message, UI ui)
      Method that change CLI state of player that has triggered an error. It assumes that player in turn is the only one that can make a mistake during his turn, for this reason, it updates his interface, while other players get notified through error showing.
      Parameters:
      message - message received.
      ui - player's interface.
